data.title: NetSuite for Software Companies
data.meta_description: NetSuite's cloud ERP is the #1 choice of technology for software companies who are looking to streamline and automate business processes.
data.meta_site_name: ScaleNorth: Best NetSuite Solution Provider & NetSuite Consultant
data.text:
The #1 ERP for Software Companies

Why NetSuite for Software Companies?

NetSuite ERP is the all-in-one solution for software companies to fuel growth, drive international expansion, and simplify financial and operational processes.

Save time, reduce costs and stay on top of your business with NetSuite ERP for software companies. NetSuite’s all-in-one cloud solution supports your software business with industry specific finance & accounting, CRM, HR, marketing, project management, and more.

Contact Us To Learn More

NetSuite allows software companies to scale their business while streamlining and modernizing operations through innovation and automation. NetSuite is the leading ERP for software companies, and is a tried and true solution that scales from pre-revenue stages to IPO and beyond.

• 2/3rds of all Tech IPOs are utilizing NetSuite

• 88% of Bessemer’s “Next Cloud Unicorns” use NetSuite

• 56 of the JMP 100 Private Software Companies use NetSuite

• 22 of the Wall Street Journal’s “Billion Dollar Startups” use NetSuite

Learn more about NetSuite’s powerful solutions such as CRM, HR, marketing, and analytics capabilities by clicking below.

Why NetSuite for Software & Technology Companies?

Basic systems like QuickBooks struggle with the advanced accounting required for software companies. Recurring revenue, renewals, and revenue recognition are just a few of the features your software company will love about NetSuite.

Order Management

Streamlined Billing

Revenue Recognition

Faster Closing of the Books

Recurring Revenue Optimization

Consolidated Global Financials

Subscription Billing Automation

Renewal Management

GAAP & IFRS Compliance

Why NetSuite for High Growth Software Companies?



Scaleable

NetSuite ERP is the foundation powering today’s fastest growing companies from startup to IPO and beyond. NetSuite uniquely understands the challenges facing hyper-growth software companies.



Streamlined

Increase financial and operational efficiency and accuracy through automation of key business processes. ScaleNorth’s NetSuite consultants are experts in automating routine processes to decrease manual labor and improve visibility.



Modernized

NetSuite ERP offers a solution that fosters innovation within your organization while being easy to use and accessible anytime, anywhere. It’s the leading true-cloud solution, unlike many other ERPs that were adapted for the cloud.



Customizeable

With the SuiteCloud platform, NetSuite offers multiple tools that empower you to both configure and customize NetSuite to meet your specific business needs. ScaleNorth can tailor NetSuite to perfectly fit your organization.



Accessible

Thanks to its true-cloud architecture and mobile friendliness, NetSuite allows you to run your business from anywhere in the world. Whether you have one location or twenty, NetSuite ensures that everyone has access to the data they need when they need it.



Integration Ready

For software companies that have business essential software outside of the NetSuite ecosystem, experienced consultants like ScaleNorth can integrate those software to NetSuite to give you maximum visibility and efficiency.



Visible

NetSuite’s advanced reporting capabilities allows you to view detailed reports on KPIs, create company wide or role specific dashboards, run saved searches and more without writing code or advanced technical know-how.



Financial Management

Using NetSuite for software companies can drastically decrease the time required for managing compliance, lessen reporting time and resources, reduced time to close the books, and more.

Other Benefits of NetSuite for Software Companies



Eliminate the use of error-prone spreadsheets



Speed up the financial close process



Reduce IT support and resource costs



Reduce manual reconciliations



Improve order processing efficiency



Gain control of critical compliance activities
